text: Ariana DeBose (; born January 25, 1991) is an American actress, singer, and dancer. She is best known for playing Anita in Steven Spielberg's musical movie West Side Story (2021). She won a Golden Globe Award and Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2022 for her role as Anita. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Raleigh, North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Best Supporting Actress Academy Award winners
title: Ariana DeBose
